entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Sunday 12 February 2023
